tossups.question: A 5-4-isomerase named for this letter is the dehydrogenase (“de-hy-DRODG-en-ase”) which produces the ketone on testosterone and converts between classes of steroid named for this letter. The input to the porphyrin synthesis pathway has a name that begins with this Greek letter because it is a five-carbon amino acid with no sidechains. A numerical superscript on this letter is used to indicate where there’s a gap in the double bonds of a cyclic molecule, which differentiates isomers of (*) THC. Covalent bonds named for this letter have two lobal planes and thus four distinct lobes. The lineage B.1.617.2 is named for this letter and is a more transmissible variant of COVID-19 capable of reinfecting vaccinated individuals. For 10 points, bonds between d orbitals are named for what fourth Greek letter?
tossups.answer: delta [accept delta-aminolevulinic acid, delta-8-THC, delta-9-THC, ; prompt on A or d before “Greek” with “what Greek letter?”]
tossups.question_sanitized: A 5-4-isomerase named for this letter is the dehydrogenase (“de-hy-DRODG-en-ase”) which produces the ketone on testosterone and converts between classes of steroid named for this letter. The input to the porphyrin synthesis pathway has a name that begins with this Greek letter because it is a five-carbon amino acid with no sidechains. A numerical superscript on this letter is used to indicate where there’s a gap in the double bonds of a cyclic molecule, which differentiates isomers of (*) THC. Covalent bonds named for this letter have two lobal planes and thus four distinct lobes. The lineage B.1.617.2 is named for this letter and is a more transmissible variant of COVID-19 capable of reinfecting vaccinated individuals. For 10 points, bonds between d orbitals are named for what fourth Greek letter?
tossups.answer_sanitized: delta [accept delta-aminolevulinic acid, delta-8-THC, delta-9-THC, ; prompt on A or d before “Greek” with “what Greek letter?”]

parts: Harry Styles said that the fruity title of this psychedelic smash-hit was inspired by seeing a copy of Richard Brautigan’s absurd novel titled “In” this substance.
The title of the first novel written by Brautigan is echoed by this Paul Torday book about a Scottish angler who helps to populate Middle Eastern wadis with Scottish fish.
This man’s 2011 documentary series “All Watched Over By Machines of Loving Grace” takes its title from a Brautigan poem of the same name, which rhapsodises about a technological utopia.

parts: Name these objects. Kovalevsky showed that she had found the third holonomic integrable (“IN-teg-ra-ble”) example of these objects, and then proved that it was the last remaining one.

The defining characteristic of the Kovalevskaya top is that its values for this quantity are in a 1:1:2 (“one to one to two”) ratio. A body will typically have three different values for this rotational analogue of mass.

The two integrable tops other than Kovalevskaya’s are named for these two scientists. In the calculus of variations, these scientists are the two namesakes of a set of equations which provide stationary points of the action.

parts: Elwood Haynes built one of America’s first profitable mass-produced cars in Kokomo and responded to his wife’s complaints about her cutlery tarnishing by inventing cutlery made of this sort of metal.

The first canned example of this fruit’s juice was produced in Kokomo, having been invented in nearby French Lick. This fruit’s juice was made the first state beverage by Ohio, and Flavr Savr, the first approved genetically modified food, was one of these fruit.

The first push-button one of these products was made by Delco in Kokomo. The company Motorola is named because it originally manufactured these automobile accessories, which are not stolen quite as often as they once were.

parts: Rioting over economic conditions stemming from the crisis forced this long-time Indonesian president to resign in 1998. Earlier, this man played a central role in removing Sukarno from power.

The crash was heralded by the collapse of this Thai financial giant, then the biggest piece of the Thai financial sector. This company's head, Pin Chakkaphak, embezzled $35 million from this company and fled to the UK at the start of the crisis.

parts: Name this process, in which a denatured protein assumes its energetically favorable native state.

The AlphaFold AI more than doubled the score of its closest competitor, struggling only with domains with this property. Alpha-synuclein and tau are proteins that “intrinsically” have this property, which is also held by the various linkers and loops that connect domains.

Folding can proceed through a “molten” intermediate of this shape. Proteins with this shape are contrasted with “fibrillary” examples and their assembly is driven by the localization of hydrophobic regions into their interior.

parts: Name this ice hockey legend, nicknamed “the Great One”. In this man’s honour, the entire NHL retired the jersey number 99.
Gretzky’s daughter Paulina is married to this golfer, who has held the world number 1 ranking for 135 weeks since February 2017. This man won the Masters in 2020.

New Democratic Party House Leader Nelson Riis attempted to have the government prevent the Edmonton Oilers from trading Gretzky to the Kings for Martin Gélinas, lots of cash, picks, and this player. In 1988, this man followed Gretzky to become the second teenager to score 50 goals in an NHL season.

New Democratic Party House Leader Nelson Riis attempted to have the government prevent the Edmonton Oilers from trading Gretzky to the Kings for Martin Gélinas, lots of cash, picks, and this player. In 1988, this man followed Gretzky to become the second teenager to score 50 goals in an NHL season.

bonuses.leadin: Answer some questions about sports analytics, for 10 points each.
bonuses.leadin_sanitized: Answer some questions about sports analytics, for 10 points each.
parts: Bill James developed the statistical approach of sabermetrics to help with analysis of this sport. Billy Beane’s Moneyball approach helped teams in this sport.

Analyst Freddie Wilde assisted this man in coaching the Multan Sultans to their first ever Pakistani Super League victory in 2021. This former head coach of the England cricket team also coaches the St Lucia Kings.
This TNT studio pundit is noted for his derision of “ah-nuh-litiks”. This retired power forward often enters into rivalrous repartee with Shaq.
